subject: Am / Fm Radio Hack II almost done!
author: Sumra Dume
full_text:
Hi,

I hope to finish Hack II and post tomorrow night.
This will allow random scan rates and random scan direction up or down 
also a squelch like feature to allow, the radio to go completely 
silent. 

It takes a pic chip, but it's worth the effort. I'll post the Hex
code for the chip and the mods!

www.ghostboxhacks.com

-Sum
